link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: If the reported value is "No" in "Whether the company is purely into investment activities without any customer interface?" then details in "(a) If No, Please provide the relevant details on type of customer interface the NBFC has" is required and if the reported value is "Yes" then information is not required.

If the reported value is "Yes" in row "Whether the company was holding any Public Deposits as on March 31 of reporting financial year" then amount is required for "(a) If Yes, Please furnish the amount" and if the reported value is "No", then no amount is required.

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'No') then (not(empty($V2))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'Yes') then (empty($V2)) else "false") and (if ($V1 = 'Not Applicable') then (empty($V2)) else "false")

generic:link.msg:message: If the reported value is "No" for "Has the company transferred a sum not less than 20% of its Net Profit for the year to Reserve Fund? (in terms of Sec 45-IC of the RBI Act, 1934)." then details is required in "If No, Please provide the reasons for the same" and if the reported value is "Yes" then details not required.

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'true') then (not(empty( $V2)) and not(empty( $V3))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'false') then (empty($V2) and empty($V3)) else 'false')

generic:link.msg:message:
"Reporting of ""(a) If Yes, what is amount received in the form of FDI"" and ""(b) If Yes, did the company fully complied with all the extant directions, terms and conditions of FDI"" is mandatory, If user selects ""Yes"" for ""Has the company received any FDI?"".
Reporting of ""(a) If Yes, what is amount received in the form of FDI"" and ""(b) If Yes, did the company fully complied with all the extant directions, terms and conditions of FDI"" is not mandatory, If user selects ""No"" for ""Has the company received any FDI?""."

If the reported value is "Yes" for "Whether the company made any Overseas Investment during the Financial Year and/ or is having Overseas Investment as on March 31 of financial year for which data is reported" then information is required for "(a) If Yes, did the company fully comply with all the conditions stipulated under applicable Master Direction DNBR. PD. 008/03.10.119/2016-17 and Master Direction DNBR.PD.007/03.10.119/2016-17" otherwise information is not required.

If the reported value is "Yes" for "Whether the company participated in the Interest Rate Future Markets as clients during the financial year?" then amount is required for "(a)If Yes, Please furnish the total notional principal amount (for both short and long positions) of Interest Rate Future transactions entered into by NBFC as client during the reporting financial year" otherwise amount is not required.

If the reported value is "Yes" for "Whether the NBFC participated in the Interest Rate Future Markets as trading members during the financial year?" then amount is required for "(a) If Yes, Please furnish the total notional principal amount (for both short and long positions) of Interest Rate Future transactions entered into by NBFC as trading member during the reporting financial year" otherwise amount is not required.

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'true') then (not(empty( $V2)) and not(empty( $V3))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'false') then (empty($V2) and empty($V3)) else "false")

generic:link.msg:message: If the reported value is "Yes" for "Whether the equity of the company is listed on any of the Stock Exchanges?" then informations are required for "If Yes, (a) Name of the Stock Exchange" and "(b) Date of First Listing" otherwise information is not required.

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'false') then empty($V2) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'true') then (not(empty($V2))) else "false")

generic:link.msg:message: If the reported value is "Yes" for "Has there been any takeover/acquisition of control/ change in shareholding/ Management during the year which required prior approval from RBI?" then details required for "(a) If Yes, Please provide the details of the same" otherwise details not required.

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'true') then (not(empty( $V2)) and not(empty( $V3))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'false') then (empty($V2) and empty($V3)) else "false")

generic:link.msg:message: If the reported value is "Yes" for "Whether the Statutory Auditor is appointed by the company in the past?" then informations are required for "If Yes, please share the details the previous contract From Date" and "If Yes, please share the details the previous contract To Date" and if the reported value is "No" then information is not required.

Reporting of "Please select Credit Information Companies (CICs) to which company is a member" and "If Others, please mention names" is not mandatory, If user selects "0" in "In how many Credit Information Companies the company has taken membership?"

Reporting of "Please select Credit Information Companies (CICs) to which company is a member" is mandatory, If user selects other than "0" in "In how many Credit Information Companies the company has taken membership?"
Reporting of"% of Factoring Assets to Total Assets and "% of Factoring Income to Gross Income" should be reported if company is classified as an NBFC-Factor.
Reporting of"% of Factoring Assets to Total Assets and "% of Factoring Income to Gross Income" is not mandatory if company is classified is not an NBFC-Factor.
Reporting of"% of Qualifying Assets to Net Assets" and "Net Assets (Amount Rs. in lakhs) (Only for MFIs)" should be reported if company classified as an NBFC-MFI.
Reporting of"% of Qualifying Assets to Net Assets" and "Net Assets (Amount Rs. in lakhs) (Only for MFIs)" is not mandatory if company classified is not an NBFC-MFI.
Reporting of"% of Infrastructure Loans to Total Assets" should be reported if company classified is an NBFC-IFC.
Reporting of"% of Infrastructure Loans to Total Assets" is not mandatory if company classified is not an NBFC-IFC.
Reporting of"Name of the Sponsor NBFC-IFC" and "% of equity of IDF-NBFC held by NBFC-IFC" should be reported if company classified is an NBFC-IDF.
Reporting of"Name of the Sponsor NBFC-IFC" and "% of equity of IDF-NBFC held by NBFC-IFC" is not mandatory if company classified is not an NBFC-IDF.

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'Yes') then ((not(empty($V2))) and (empty($V3))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'No') then ((empty($V2)) and (not(empty($V3)))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'Not Applicable') then ((empty($V2)) and (empty($V3))) else 'false')

generic:link.msg:message: If the reported value is "Yes" in "Whether the company complied with filing of records of mortgages with the CERSAI?" then only date is required in "If Yes, Date of last such filing with CERSAI" and if the reported value is "No" in "Whether the company complied with filing of records of mortgages with the CERSAI?" then only reason is rquired in "If No, Please choose the reason from the menu for not obtaining of registration from CERSAI and if the reported value is "Not Applicable" in "Whether the company complied with filing of records of mortgages with the CERSAI?" then details not required".

If the reported value is "Yes" in "Whether the company sponsored any IDF?" then details is required in "If yes, whether the NBFC complied with all regulations in Chapter VIII of Master Direction DNBR. PD. 008/03.10.119/2016-17?".

If the reported value is s "No" in "Whether the company sponsored any IDF?" then details not requried in "If yes, whether the NBFC complied with all regulations in Chapter VIII of Master Direction DNBR. PD. 008/03.10.119/2016-17?" and "If No, please furnish the relevant information for such non-compliance by the company".

If the reported value is "No" in "If yes, whether the NBFC complied with all regulations in Chapter VIII of Master Direction DNBR. PD. 008/03.10.119/2016-17?" then information is required in "If No, please furnish the relevant information for such non-compliance by the company" and if the reported value is "Yes" then information is not required.

va:valueAssertion.test: (if ($V1 = 'true') then (not(empty($V2)) and not(empty($V3)) and not(empty($V4)) and not(empty($V5)) and empty($V6) and empty($V7) and not(empty($V8))) else 'false') and (if ($V1 = 'false') then (empty($V2) and empty($V3) and empty($V4) and empty($V5) and not(empty($V6)) and not(empty($V7)) and empty($V8)) else "false")

generic:link.msg:message: If the reported value is "Yes" in "Whether the company is a Deposit-taking NBFC, systemically important NBFC, MFI or IFC?" then details required in "(a) If Yes, CRAR % of NBFC as on March 31 of Reporting Financial Year", "Whether minimum CRAR as required by applicable Master Directions was maintained on an on-going basis?", "Tier I % of NBFC as on March 31 of Reporting Financial Year" and "Whether minimum Tier I capital as required by applicable Master Directions was maintained on an on-going basis?" and "Tier II % as on March 31 of reporting financial year" else details not required and if the reported value is "No" then details required in "If No, Leverage Ratio as on March 31 of Reporting Financial Year" and "Whether the company had maintained Leverage Ratio of 7:1 on an ongoing basis during the Financial Year? else details not required.

If the reported value is s "No" in "Whether the company had conducted the business of NBFI during the year?" then details are required in "If No, Please provide the details of the same" and if the reported value is "Yes" then details are not required.

If the reported value is s "No" in "Whether the company is eligible to continue the hold the CoR for the next year?" then reason is required in "If No, Please provide the reasons for the same" and if the reported value is "Yes" then reason is not required.
Identity "a) % of Factoring Assets to Total Assets =Out of 1 above- Loans eligible for factoring business- NBFC Factor/Total Assets" do not tally.
Identity "% of Qualifying Assets to Net Assets =Out of 1 above - Qualifying asset for Micro Finance Institution (NBFC-MFI)/Total Assets" do not tally.
Identity "% of Infrastructure Loans to Total Assets =Out of 1 above - Assets in infrastructure loans for Infrastructure Finance Company (IFC)/Total Assets" do not tally.

If the reported value is s "Others" in "(a) Please select Credit Information Companies (CICs) to which company is a member." then names required in "(b) If Others, please mention names" and if the reported value is other than "Others" then names not required.

Identity "Value of Gross Non Performing Assets (GNPA) as on March 31 of reporting financial year = (Amount of Gross Non Performing Assets (GNPA) as on March 31st of Reporting Financial Year/ Total Assets, if Total Assets < > 0; Else Value of Gross Non Performing Assets (GNPA) as on March 31 of reporting financial year = 0)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Net Non Performing Assets (NNPA) as on March 31 of reporting financial year = (Amount of Net Non Performing Assets (NNPA) as on March 31st of Reporting Financial Year/ Total Assets, if Total Assets < > 0; Else Value of Net Non Performing Assets (NNPA) as on March 31 of reporting financial year = 0)" do not tally.

va:valueAssertion.test: ($V2 = "(i) NBFC - Investment and Credit Company (NBFC-ICC) (Loan Company (LC) /Asset Finance Company (AFC) / Investment Company (IC))") or ($V2 = "(xi) Others")

generic:link.msg:message: Only valid combination for “Deposit taking NBFC” from “Category of the Company” is “NBFC - Investment and Credit Company (NBFC-ICC) (Loan Company (LC) /Asset Finance Company (AFC) / Investment Company (IC))” Or “Others” from “The company has been classifed by RBI as:"
